pages.title: The Warped Mosco
pages.text: To spawn this insect with a crippling case of roid-rage, a Crimson Mosquito will need to drink the blood of a Mungus coated in Warped Fungus, and I assure you all of those are real words. Good luck, it's a strong asshole.$(br)To obtain the Heart Container, you'll need to slay all of:$(li)The Warped Mosco$(li)The Hullbreaker
